message.content:
cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.PL 

This paper is about self-adaptive systems, which are a subfield of software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the use of machine learning (cs.AI) and system evolution (cs.SY) to improve the self-adaptation process. The proposed approach involves exploring and selecting adaptation actions, which can be seen as a reinforcement learning problem (cs.LG). Finally, the paper discusses the use of feature models, which are a modeling technique used in software product line engineering (cs.PL).
